hero.badge: Professional Web Development in Valencia and Alicante
hero.subtitle: Software engineers with experience in top tech companies. We create websites, mobile apps, and SEO solutions that generate real results for businesses in Valencia and Alicante: more clients, better rankings, and optimized processes.

problems.tag: Why Do You Need a Professional Website?

card1.title: Without a Website, You Lose Clients Every Day
card1.desc: 89% of consumers search online before buying. If your business doesn't have a professional website or is hard to find, your clients are choosing your competition.

card2.title: A Bad Website Damages Your Reputation
card2.desc: A slow, outdated, or non-mobile-friendly website conveys a lack of professionalism. Clients in Valencia and Alicante are looking for modern and reliable businesses.

card3.title: Manual Management Limits Your Growth
card3.desc: Wasting time with phone reservations, WhatsApp orders, or inventory in Excel prevents you from scaling. A good web application automates and optimizes your business.

services.subtitle: We create custom digital solutions for businesses that want to grow. From professional websites to complex applications.

s1.title: Professional Websites
s1.desc: Modern, fast, and mobile-optimized web design and development. Perfect for restaurants, hotels, stores, clinics, and businesses in Valencia and Alicante.

s2.title: SEO and Search Ranking
s2.desc: We improve your business's traffic so customers can find you on Google. Specialized local SEO for businesses in the Valencian Community.

s3.title: Mobile Applications
s3.desc: iOS and Android app development for your business. Order management, reservations, delivery, or any specific need you might have.

s4.title: E-commerce and Online Stores
s4.desc: Complete online stores with payment gateways, inventory management, and shipping. Sell your products 24/7 across Spain.

s5.title: Custom Web Applications
s5.desc: Custom systems for your business: reservation management, CRMs, learning platforms, directories, marketplaces, and more.

s6.title: Technology Consulting
s6.desc: Hourly consulting to improve your existing projects, solve technical problems, or plan your digital strategy.

diff.title: Software Engineers with Real Experience
diff.subtitle: We are not an agency with middlemen. We are developers who work directly on your project.

d1.title: Experience in Top-Tier Teams
d1.desc: We work as frontend team leads in tech companies. We apply industry best practices to your project.

d2.title: Modern and Scalable Technology
d2.desc: We use React, Next.js, Node.js, and the latest technologies. Your website will be fast, modern, and ready to grow.

d3.title: Direct and Close Communication
d3.desc: You speak directly with the person programming your project. No middlemen, no misunderstandings. In-person meetings in Valencia if you prefer.

d4.title: We Know the Local Market
d4.desc: We understand the needs of businesses in Valencia and Alicante. Local SEO, languages, Spanish payment gateways, and everything else you need.

s1.title: Discovery
s1.desc: We audit your business, competitors, and market. You get a clear picture of what is costing you money — and how AI solves it.

s2.title: Strategy
s2.desc: Custom roadmap with projected ROI, timelines, and KPIs. You will know exactly what you get before we write a single line of code.

s3.title: Build
s3.desc: Our senior engineers build your solution in agile sprints. Weekly demos, real-time progress, and zero surprises.

s4.title: Optimization
s4.desc: AI-driven testing and optimization. Every element is fine-tuned for maximum conversion, speed, and ranking.

s5.title: Scale
s5.desc: Launch is just the beginning. We continuously improve your systems, add AI capabilities, and ensure you always stay ahead.

c1.title: El Mediterráneo Restaurant
c1.desc: Website with integrated online reservations and QR digital menu. Increased reservations by 180% and reduced phone calls, allowing staff to focus on service.

c2.title: Costa Blanca Hotel
c2.desc: Direct booking system that eliminated booking commissions. Recovered the investment in 4 months with a 65% increase in direct bookings.

c3.title: Fashion Boutique Valencia
c3.desc: Online store with optimized local SEO. Tripled online sales in 6 months and now sells across Spain with shipping from Valencia.

tech.subtitle: We use the same technology trusted by Google, Netflix, and Amazon — scaled for your business.

cta.subtitle: Every week you wait, your competition moves further ahead. Let's talk about how AI can transform your business — completely free, with no obligation.
